page.title: 08A Day In My Life
page.content: Every Sunday my brother comes and wakes me up when I'm asleep. Sometimes I read a book. When Craig comes in I pretend I am asleep and I look out of the corner of my eye to see what he is doing. Then I wake pretending I have been asleep. He tells me to read Pussy in the Well which is his favourite rhyme. I recite it over and over again. When mum gets up Craig rushes to his bedroom and pretends he was asleep. When mum knocks on the doors we wake up. After that we have a shower get dried and dressed then we go down and have breakfast.I then go upstairs with a duster in my hand to dust my room. After that I play or go to the market. Then my brother asks if he can play with me. I say yes so we play Guess Who. Then we play I Spy. After that we play with lego. After dinner I play my guitar and watch T.V.
